Text: I strongly recommend people not share this. I got a DMCA letter from them. They will enforce protection of their copyrights. Their stuff is high quality but I chose to delete it all after I got the letter.
can you scan such a DCMA letter (where you can use ms paint to black out sensitive info) and put it online on imageshack.us ?
Thanks for the TTC course material and guidebooks, dohduhdah. What an amazing find these are. (Was a DMCA letter ever submitted to you?)

Never got a dmca letter, but I'm in the Netherlands.
I did get some copyright infringement complaints via my ISP way back when I was fetching my first TTC courses from demonoid, but that doesn't seem to happen anymore.
